## MapView.mapAnchors property

The node in this MapView's scene containing the user \[\[MapAnchor\]\]s. All (first level) children of this node will be positioned in world space according to the \[\[MapAnchor.geoPosition\]\]. Deeper level children can be used to position custom objects relative to the anchor node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get mapAnchors(): THREE.Object3D;
```
